incorrectRecords.question: อยากเป็น Mars terraformer ต้องมีทักษะอะไร มีวิชาไหนสอนมั้ย
incorrectRecords.reasoning: Outcome/Goal-Oriented (Pattern B) - user expresses desire to become a Mars terraformer and asks about skills and courses, which are academically plausible topics related to space science and planetary engineering.
